#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
	ll dp[1000001];
 
int main()
{
	for(ll i=0;i<1000001;i++) dp[i]=0;
	ll n;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	ll temp=n;
	while(temp--)
	{
		int p;
		scanf("%d",&p);
		dp[p]++;
	}
	ll ans=(n*(n-1))/2;
	for(ll i=0;i<1000001;i++) if(dp[i]) ans-=(dp[i]*(dp[i]-1))/2;
	printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
